definition.name: 'Stale Issue Cleanup' Action for GitHub Actions
definition.description: Close issues and pull requests with no recent activity

inputs.name: repo-token
inputs.description: Token for the repository. Can be passed in using {{ secrets.GITHUB_TOKEN }}

inputs.name: stale-issue-message
inputs.description: The message to post on the issue when tagging it. If none provided, will not mark issues stale.

inputs.name: stale-pr-message
inputs.description: The message to post on the pr when tagging it. If none provided, will not mark pull requests stale.

inputs.name: days-before-stale
inputs.description: The number of days old an issue can be before marking it stale.

inputs.name: days-before-close
inputs.description: The number of days to wait to close an issue or pull request after it being marked stale.

inputs.name: stale-issue-label
inputs.description: The label to apply when an issue is stale.

inputs.name: exempt-issue-labels
inputs.description: The labels to apply when an issue is exempt from being marked stale. Separate multiple labels with commas (eg. "label1,label2")

inputs.name: stale-pr-label
inputs.description: The label to apply when a pull request is stale.

inputs.name: exempt-pr-labels
inputs.description: The labels to apply when a pull request is exempt from being marked stale. Separate multiple labels with commas (eg. "label1,label2")

inputs.name: ancient-issue-message
inputs.description: The message to post when an issue is very old.

inputs.name: ancient-pr-message
inputs.description: The message to post when a pr is very old.

inputs.name: days-before-ancient
inputs.description: The number of days old an issue can be before marking it ancient.

inputs.name: response-requested-label
inputs.description: The label that gets applied when a response is requested.

inputs.name: closed-for-staleness-label
inputs.description: The label that gets applied when an issue is closed for staleness.

inputs.name: minimum-upvotes-to-exempt
inputs.description: The minimum number of "upvotes" that an issue needs to have before not marking as ancient.

inputs.name: loglevel
inputs.description: Set to DEBUG to enable debug logging

inputs.name: dry-run
inputs.description: Set to true to not perform repository changes

inputs.name: use-created-date-for-ancient
inputs.description: Set to true to use issue created date instead of modified date for determining an ancient issue.

evidence.reasoning: The action is designed to manage stale issues and pull requests, which falls under maintenance. It also communicates with users by posting messages on issues, thus fitting into communication and notification categories.
